alert.note: Alert for Jones (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 30 at 8:53PM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Jones County through 1045 PM CDT... At 952 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Nowlin to near Okaton to near Swift Bear. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Okaton around 1000 PM CDT. Westover and Intersection of Highway 83 and White River around 1010 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Murdo, Capa and Draper. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in Aberdeen.
